# Super Fang Wolf Fang

## Quick Facts
- Classification: Taijutsu, Collaboration Techniques
- Class: Offensive
- Range: Mid, Long
- Users: Kiba Inuzuka~~with~Akamaru, Akamaru~~with~Kiba Inuzuka
- Media: Anime, Game

## Summary
Man and beast transform into a single two-headed gigantic animal by the Human Beast Combination Transformation: Double-Headed Wolf technique, and just like its parent technique, have their body spin in a violent assault against the enemy. The power is great enough to break through three Rash≈çmon gates without losing its power.

## Notes
- In addition unlike its parent technique it does not first require the use of Dynamic Marking first.
